lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hello everyone, and welcome to tonight's episode of Critical Role, where a bunch of us nerdy-ass voice actors sit around and play Dungeons & Dragons.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (silly voice) Dungeons and Dragons!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Like that. Before we jump into tonight's episode, we have some quick announcements to get through. First off, we have two fantastic sponsors for tonight's episode! Our good friends for the whole campaign, D&D Beyond, which we'll get to in just a second, and tonight a recurring friend who's come by to say hi for this episode, our friends at Backblaze. Sam?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hi everyone! This time next week, we'll be doing this show in New York City!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: New York City!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: "And that was just act one!" Dames and fellas alike are shaking a leg to Backblaze on Broadway! With music by Andrew Lloyd Website and Cameron Mac-or-PC, the spectacle features glitzy stars like Data Rivera, Computer Streisand, and the young starlet Angela Lansbury. Backblaze will get your toes tapping with songs like "Some Enchanted Upload," "I Could Have Backed Up All Night," and "I've Grown Accustomed to Her Encryption." Plus, Blaza Minnelli and her tap dancing hard drives! Punky Winkerbean of the New York Daily News hails, "I've never seen a closing number where the lead "character re-installs an operating system from a backup disc he received via the mail! I smell "Tony!" The best part? Tickets are just $5 a month! That's a five-spot with no gimmicks, add-ons, or gotchas. Go to backblaze.com/criticalrole to start a free trial, and let them know Crit Role sent you! Curtain up! Light the lights! Run, don't walk to Backblaze on Broadway! (applause)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That was great.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Brava!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I like that one of your own shitty puns made you drop the voice entirely.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sam is my favorite when he's judging his own jokes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thank you, Taliesin, for this stunning Broadway style.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Its second appearance now on Critical Role.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I feel like someone needs to name a bong Blaza Minnelli, by the way. That's a perfect bong name.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They've put out one piece of art that has the mind flayer pirate captain in one of the stages, which is basically Davy Jones. It's Davy Jones, but he's a mind flayer. It's pretty great. But there's a lot of fun stuff in there, I'm excited for you guys to check it out. That will be available for preorder on dndbeyond.com right now and will be released November 2nd, so go check it out. Let's see, other announcements to get through.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Chick-a-chick ah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Bow bow! Jesus. It's the five golden rings thing. You can't resist it. Next week, guys, we are in New York. We are at New York Comic Con with our live show next Thursday. Tickets are still available. It's at the United Palace in Washington Heights next Thursday the 4th. They're available now via Ticketmaster. You don't need a badge to the convention to attend, it's completely offsite and a separate entity, so come join us! If you're attending New York Comic Con be sure to pick up a presale ticket to come meet us at the convention as well, we have panels going on, it's going to be crazy. You can find all the events and information for it at critrole.com/events. We also have a bunch of shows that are all happening now!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, man!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All developed and put to the test and given creation from our fantastic creative director, Marisha Ray.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Yay!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yaas, queen! She's working her butt off.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm so tired.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Working her butt off.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know. The latest episode of Between the Sheets, starring our fantastic Travis Willingham, aired this Monday-- it was great-- is now available on YouTube. If you didn't get a chance to see it then or subscribe to our Twitch, it's on YouTube now for free.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Go watch it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go watch it, it's really great.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Or listen to it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, that's right, the podcast as well.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They might get me confused with you just because our voices are so--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's true, that happens all the time. Laura will be the next guest on Between the Sheets next week, so you get to look for that next Monday on twitch.tv/criticalrole.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I wonder what I said.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Luckily we recorded it all.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Our newest show, All Work No Play, are these two buggers who have returned, too.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's tomorrow night.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Tomorrow night, also at 7:00pm Pacific here at twitch.tv/criticalrole. Look for that, it's a continuation of their grand podcast from ages past. It's real special.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're going to jump in the chat.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're going to jump in the shat?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're going to jump in the shat.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's a good activity.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're going to shat in the chat tomorrow night during the show.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Shat chat.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm sure that's an old AOL chat room that no one wants to go to. But yeah, tomorrow night, look forward to that. Let's see, merch, Laura, you have some announcements?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. Oh my gosh. We have our first Keyleth shirt.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's out?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's in the store right now! There's two styles; we got our "Sleeves are Bullshit" shirt-- why don't we have it?

lines.name: TALIESIN, MARISHA
lines.text: We did have one.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Where is it? I still haven't seen it!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We'll bring it out during the break; it's really cool. Go check it out at Crit Role: shop.critrole.com. You know, they've got one that's sleeveless, that's a girl's, and then one that's unisex that's not as sleeveless. And those are pre-order, so if you order them, they're going to ship in two weeks, so that means they're not sold out immediately, so that's really great for people that want to actually get them. We also have our Deven Rue maps. By the way, that Keyfish-- this Keyfish-- was designed by Lauryn Ipsum, who's phenomenal and we know her from her work on the artbooks. We have our mini Yasha bust in the store right now; we have the Wildemount dice that are still in the store right now, and there's other stuff like a bumper sticker that you can proclaim-- I keep talking about the bumper sticker.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Traveler is my co-pilot.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Trying to spread that good word.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You want to see one on the 405 one day, don't you?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I do! I really want to see the bumper sticker.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just run up and bumper tap them.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They get out and they see Laura and go, "Ah!"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do I see the shirt waiting in the wings right now? We do.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes! Hey, Vinny!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is the uni-sexy one. It's so uni-sexy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, wow.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (British accent) Look, I don't know if you can see it, but it's a goldfish with little dice trailing behind, and then there's a special little treat at the bottom that says, "It's fine, we're gods."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, that's so cool!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That fish looks so disturbed.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It is a very disturbed fish, yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That fish has instant regrets.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, it's like it jumped off a cliff and killed myself for no reason.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: "What did I do?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: With nothing achieved.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We just lost money on that death. It was a very expensive death.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I loved it. So good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Welcome back. Last we left off, The Mighty Nein had been following a story thread. They had encountered some pieces of paper that alluded to a mystical orb that they had previously encountered that seemed to be related to something about your patron, Fjord. After unknowingly having a vision and absorbing this orb within yourself, you completed your business up in the Empire, and following information in this note, you made your way south outside of the Dwendalian Empire to the Menagerie Coast to the city of Nicodranas, which was home-- and is home-- to Jester.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Freudian slip.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Bought some pets along the way, lost some pets along the way, but you met the Ruby of the Sea. You aided her in absolving herself of the stress of having a really, unfortunately aggressive admirer who was becoming a serious problem, so you told him to stop by cutting off his hand and sending him away forever.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, and killing all of his friends.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Then you went to inquire the docks at night, looking for an individual named Marius LePual.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's bad when you say it like that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The recap really sticks it in and turns it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You stealthed you way there, began to formulate a plan to listen in. Unfortunately, due to a not quite as quiet attempt at entering the water, garnished their attention. A not quite effective attempt at deceiving them triggered them to realize that they were being followed and proceeded to try and cover their tracks and take out those who would be following them. That led to a scuffle in the battlefield of the docks here in the wharf where you alerted the guards, managed to take down these shadowy figures, captured Marius LePual, and hijacked their ship called The Mist, where you managed to leave the docks out into the night air, the moonlit open night. You had just managed to take down a few figures that remained on the ship, a few things were burned in the process. The chaos was palpable. Caduceus managed to swim out to you guys in time to make it onto the ship, and where we left off, you all had taken a moment, and some of you began to head back into the ship to see what lied within. Mighty Nein, what would you like to do?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, you know, all told, I think that went very well. It could've been worse; they attacked us, unprovoked. I know that we were not exactly normal-seeming to them, but we did not get threatening with them. They made the first move, and it just unraveled from there, what can you do? Sometimes, you just have to follow the cabbages in front of you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. I'm at the helm. Is there anybody down below, seeing about that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Jester, I think, was rushing down.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I was on my way down, right when I stuck an axe in the back of a guy's head.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What did you say?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I accidentally stuck an axe in the back of a guy's head. I didn't mean to though, I was aiming for his shoulder.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You can Speak with Dead though, right? Is that something you can do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can do that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Maybe that's how we interrogate him?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know if I have it prepared, though.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We could sleep on it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Who's heading down?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Beau, if you'll stay with me. We need to--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I do have it prepared!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We need to check the ship for damages because we tried to blow it up a couple of times, and then if the rest want to head down and see what's below.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll come with.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Jester and Nott? Who else?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I will go down as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, and Caleb. Caduceus, you're staying up. Yasha's--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I am going to just sit at the front of the ship, wet, and I'm not in any of this right

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Any chance you want to come up and help me? I pull a big piece of splintered wood out of my forehead, throw it over to the side. In time, I'm good.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll help you out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thanks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yasha steps over to you, Caduceus, and she puts a hand to your shoulder and she goes, "Glad you're okay."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You keep leaving.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You keep finding me. Or they do."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think you might have the right idea.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (whispering) Oh no.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, I'm just going to sit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yasha stands up, looks back towards you guys, goes over and takes a rope and begins helping you guys hold onto the sails, watching you and figuring out what to do. None of you have ever really run a boat before.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yasha's following me? I'm like: You can follow me, but I'm just--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, she's just helping you out with whatever you need on the ship.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll bark out: Make sure the sails are open, tighten all the everything off, and then check the exterior of the ship if you can just for breaks in the wood, fire marks, any damage that you can see.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, make an investigation check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Some of the wood right around the edge of the deck is broken and splintered in a bit and part of the sail underneath was burned and singed. Not enough to the point where it tore it away from the mast. But there is visible damage, but nothing that impedes your movement. Just more aesthetic damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It just looks more dope now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: More dope?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, we look like badasses. I think it makes the ship look cooler.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nice.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, we look rad.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Less fancy will actually do us some good in these waters, so that's good.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys head down. Jester, as you're the first person down, the first thing you notice is at the bottom of the steps, you see the fellow with the axe stuck in him and he's on his stomach and slowly crawling forward.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's not dead!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Heal him!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm out of spells.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Take the axe out of him.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is it better to pull it out or leave it in place?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it like a puncture wound? Can I cast--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll ask him. Would you like us to leave the axe in or take it out?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He looks over his shoulder. You see the blood streaks down the side of his face and-- (groaning) begins to crawl quicker away from you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, no, no. I hold onto his ankles.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (groaning) His fingernails are scraping against the wood floor.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know it's really terrible. I'm sorry that I did this, I hope you're okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can't you do healing or anything?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean I can cast Spare the Dying, but he's already not--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Spared?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah: dying.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's when he passes out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I cast Spare the Dying.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. He's just like, "Ugh."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're just going to leave hole in his head like Phineas Gage?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, I think, you know, maybe Deuce could do something about it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you want me to go get Deuce?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. See if he'll come down here for a moment.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, I'll run up there and get him.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm just going to move the axe head a centimeter or two.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't move the axe! What if his brain starts leaking out?! Don't do it!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If you press on it, can you get his hand to move?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Give it a little flick.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's so messed up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nott, as you rush up to the shadowed deck of The Mist, the moonlight still coming down, you can see the outer shape of the still-damp Caduceus, legs tucked into his shoulder, leaning back against the inside of the left hand of the deck, or what would be considered the port side.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Mr. Clay? You look-- are you okay?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know. It's been a day. It's hard to gauge.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah. Are you cold?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have this cloak that would maybe fit one of your shoulders?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to be okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, if you can muster the strength, it would be great if you could come downstairs and maybe help save an individual's life?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll get up and go down. See what's down there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Caduceus, you're have to really bend and stoop down to make your way through. But as you come down, you find both Jester and Caleb currently sitting around an unconscious enforcer, one of the cloaked figures that was involved with the crew that previously had this ship.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He got an axe in his head.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's probably good you didn't pull it out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, see!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, I'm going to tap him on the head and cast Healing Word at 3rd-level.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's 11 points right there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: As soon as Cad's hands start to glow, I yank the axe out of his head.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you yank it out and there's a streak of blood and you watch as what would be the open axe wound begins to slowly seal itself up to the point where it's still going to be healing for a while, but it scabbed over instantaneously.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Look, you just saved a life! That's good news, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, he'll be dead eventually. I'm going to head back upstairs.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fuck me! Oh god! Help!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Caduceus heads back upstairs.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Caduceus is America tonight.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Too real.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The person comes to consciousness immediately as the axe is pulled. (gasping) You get a better look at him now. You can see scruffed, probably unshaven for the past two weeks, coming out in tufts. It looks like there are parts where the hair isn't growing in because there's scarring or some sort of heavy acne at a younger age prevented those follicles from developing. Pockmarked face, weathered from sun and perpetual sunburns. You can see the actual hair itself is a matted, greasy mess of a light brown color. Looks like the kind of person you'd imagine lives at sea and not in a very monetarily comfortable income.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh hi, bud.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What's that? Who the fuck are you?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Jester, this is your axe.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ja.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So we have this ship now, but I just wanted to say: Hi, welcome to the crew! You know, we're The Mighty Nein! All your friends are gone right now, but it's because you attacked us first, really.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Just following orders, sorry."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, see! That's okay! I understand following orders.

lines.name: SAM, LAURA
lines.text: Uh-huh.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, we are a tight crew that follows orders as well. Caleb is our leader, and we--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hmm.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We are enforcers of justice and saw that justice needed to be done.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't know anything about that."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What were you guys doing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We were delivering a message, picking up a message."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A whole boat just for a message?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well--" In his position right now, he's being trepidatious in giving you information. The more you're prying, the more he's closing off and his words are trailing off. "I don't--"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, buddy, we're at sea now. We are not at the dock any more. You are trapped with us. We have questions and I don't want to alarm you. None of us want to put an axe in your head or anything.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, I don't want to do that. That was really sad.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Right, we want to just get along. We're all tired. I'm tired, but I'll go to work if I need to.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh jesus christ! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an intimidation check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh my god!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's so terrible!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fuck!

lines.name: TRAVIS, MARISHA
lines.text: But!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I was going to say, that's how we know Caleb is serious! But!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We'll be listening to him lift that rocking chair outside.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18. His whole body tenses, his eyes dart around the three of you and then slackens and he exhales in a sense of resignation. "You know what? Fuck, I'll tell you what you want. Anything you "need to know. Just-- can you let me go? Drop me back off in town or something?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I think that seems like something we're going to do.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Good decision.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah, well, it's not worth it." He sits up and you see that he's bruised and even though he's been healed, he's not used to the aftermath of physical confrontation the way you guys are. He's like (groaning), leans up against the table a bit and puts his back against it so he's leaning against the leg and top of it. (groaning)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Who do you work for?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We have a lot of questions, so tell us everything.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "This is The Mist. We're a sister ship to Captain Avantika's. Our captain was Captain "Jawgrasp, but I take it you probably killed him too."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He attacked us first, you know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, it makes sense. We're not supposed to leave any survivors who've seen what they "shouldn't have seen. General business."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, really? Why?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Just don't want to be followed. It's part of our directive."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are you pirates?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "More or less. We'll just say we're not keen on the taxation and enforcement of the Concord on "these seas. So we do what we feel is necessary."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I like it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Freedom fighters.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You said that you're sister ship to Captain Avantika?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The Squalleater, that's her ship."

lines.name: LAURA, MATT, LIAM
lines.text: The Squalleater.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ah yes, we did know that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, we did.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Gesturing to the desk and all the burned papers: What's all this, then? What was this that we can't read anymore?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Primarily it was maps to locations of things that were important. For our travels."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Like?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Like things that-- I wasn't the navigator! I didn't know specifically, but I was told to "burn everything."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is there some stuff you didn't get to?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Most of it's scrap and ash, or blank sheets that look like they were scribbled notes in a code that you don't really understand. This is the only visible thing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh yes, Matthew! Do us right! Ooh!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Take care of him. I pull out the book and I begin to do the ritual for Comprehend Languages to see if that will help with the code. It's a long shot, but I'll give it a shot.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What was the message you were trying to get?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Either he was going to pay us back for the money, "if he didn't get what he was supposed to find, and if he did have what he was supposed to deliver-- "one of the things I burned was a drawing of it, it was an orb thing. We were supposed to take that "back to Avantika."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Where is Avantika?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Avantika's on-- what's the island called? I don't remember. Don't fucking remember what it "was called. It was on there! That's it right there."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is it a secret island?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's not a secret; it's just mostly avoided. It's near one of the reef clusters of the "Lucidian Ocean, this side of the coast."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you see it, Caleb? Do you see it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm doing a ritual spell for 11 minutes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you think Mending would help fix that, or would it make the piece of paper come together?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, great fucking call.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Mending!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, you do the Mending cantrip, and because I do not have a completed map for you, we'll use our imagination.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: D&D!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It completes a much larger piece of paper, that you think would have a bunch of other either islands or the things around it. It looks like it may have been a much larger size. Unfortunately, the ink does not come through on it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But we still have the ink of that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You still have the ink of that, yeah. It's a large piece of paper that is mostly blank, and then there's that one section that is stained with the burned edges and has the actual drawing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh wow, so it spread out blank from-- that's cool.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So it's an island.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The code was where? You said there was a code, I thought?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There was some things with bits of coded language on it, it looked like. But those have also been burned, and they're in chunks. You do your--?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, it takes ten-ish minutes to do Comprehend Languages, and if I'm touching--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Is it ten minute casting time?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It is ten minutes plus one minute as a ritual. So yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As a ritual, it's whatever the duration is--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Casting time: one action, plus ten minutes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One action plus ten minutes, okay. There you go. Then it would be a total of 11 minutes. All righty. While you're working on that, you guys can continue to pry, if you want.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If we drop you off, are you going to change your name or something? Are you afraid Avantika is going to come and kill you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's other jobs out there. Find my way back to "Darktow eventually."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Tell us about-- oh, sorry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, you go. You go next.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, all right. Tell us about Avantika.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "She's a weird one. Her whole crew, they've got some weird mystical thing they're obsessed with."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Like the ball? Is it the ball?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's one of the things we're supposed to be picking up, yeah. They've got some creepy "religious thing. We work for her. She hired us as the sister ship out of Darktow and we've been "doing errands for her."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Docktow?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Darktow, yeah."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What's that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's generally the hub of most unlawful activity out here. Used to belong to the Concord, "but about 50 years back, it was taken by people of my professional interests and they haven't been "able to take it back since."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're talking about a place, an island, a building?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah, it's an island."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's where we were told Avantika is.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is that what this is? Swavain Islands?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Swavain Islands is the whole series of islands."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's a cluster out in the Lucidian Ocean.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And Darktow is also an island?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Darktow is one of the islands far, far west of here, though."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why does it say Y, Y, Y, Y?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think those could be little pointers.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm not the navigator, but I remember going in and out. There were little markers set on areas "where we were supposed to-- like visual guides if we were on the right paths and to help us get "through the reef."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Because it's on the other side of the reef.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And to go around is another hundred miles to your trip."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And you've made this trip yourself?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes. Well, we've made to and out once. We were going to go back after this."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What are the risks one would encounter trying to traverse this area?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you still working on your spell?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you live on the island? Does Avantika live on the island?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, god no. No one's going to fucking settle on that thing. It's fucking cursed."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The island is cursed?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah!"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So she docked there for a while, or--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's supposed to be something there that she wants. Well, she's waiting on us to get back "with whatever we're supposed to pick up, and if they didn't have it there, then we were supposed "to try and find out where the next one might possibly be."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The next one?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: On the hunt for ancient relics.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a dangerous game. Who knows how it will end?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Only two will find out.

lines.name: LAURA, SAM
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, sorry.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Jesus! Maybe I jump overboard.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can you tell us, because this is a bit shredded, you were here before, right? You were here?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's the island? That's where the island is, then?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I think that's the island, yeah, it's mostly jungle-covered."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did the wind blow you out, or did you fight against the wind to leave? Was this east, is this west, where is this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't know." You get the sense the more he looks at it, one, he's definitely not the navigator of the ship's crew, and probably can't read.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What's your name?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Gallan."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Gallan.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Gallan Wesmen."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I like your name.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Thank you."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Have you heard of The Traveler, Gallan?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I've met many travelers."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Have you heard of The Traveler?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: His eyes go a little narrow. He's like, "Oh no, not another one."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Another one what?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you want maybe a brochure? I could tell you about him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm okay."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You could spread his name wherever you go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'll think on it."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You've met Avantika, right? Sorry to interrupt. I don't want to cut off your weird evangelizing, but you've met Avantika?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I've seen her. I've not actually spoken to her, that was mainly--"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Have you seen her use any magic?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No. She mainly stays on the ship."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What does she look like?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's got them elven features, the pointy ears, "the whole brown-red skin. Big hair that comes in strings. Sleeveless coat, high collar, big scarf thing."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't know, I got distracted by the sleeveless coat aspect. That's all I heard.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: When he gives descriptions and we don't fucking writes notes, it bites us in the ass.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I didn't get all the details. I wasn't one of the important ones."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You should be important!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You survived this brutal attack. You are extremely strong.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's sitting there going, "Yeah. Yeah you're right."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Everyone else died. You had an axe in your head!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Fuck them! Fuck them! I'm a survivor."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You had an axe in your head! You survived!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I had a what?" He reaches back and is like-- There's like still blood back there, of course, and he's like, "I'm okay? Is it bad?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're fine.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What else do we need to know? Anything? How about this ship, you know this ship? Is there anything funky on the ship? How much food stores do we have? How many days of food and water?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well we'd just stocked up so we've got probably about two weeks of tack and water "and some ale below."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you know how to sail?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I know how to repair. I was more of the ship carpenter."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You know what we should do first? Since we have a carpenter on board?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: On the side of the ship it says "The Mist."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We should change the name.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We should get some new letters going.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Like Mysterious Ball. The Mysterious Ball.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, The Mistress of the Loins. I don't know, what would be a good name?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The Mistake.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's not bad.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Kind of appropriate?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The Mistake!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's really on brand!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We took The Mist, and now it's The Mistake.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Did my spell trigger yet?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's at least five jokes in there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll say sure. Technically ten minutes is a while, but we'll say between the small talk, you've completed your spell.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Only because I want to say, the name as it is, is fairly appropriate. We might want to change it to change up our appearance and stuff. Do you know what Mist means in Zemnian?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Fog?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It means shit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, manure. Crap, it means crap. It's pretty on brand for us, honestly.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't want to ride around in The Shit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You've been doing it for several months now, Jester.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You just draw it, you don't live in it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're going to add on to-- Mistake is funny, too. I like that. Can I read this code?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure. With the slips that you have, you read through it and it seems to be a list of supplies that were supposed to be purchased. A lot of them seem to be heavy bits of rope, chains, climbing pitons. You see ball bearings, torches. You're not quite sure why this was encoded, per se, and only for the slips that you have that are visible, but it's mainly just a list of materials.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. See these squiggles here? This is either just supplies, or maybe they are trying to make booby traps for their island. I don't know.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are there any intact maps, like larger scale maps of the ocean?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Unfortunately, no. You look around you and there is ash everywhere. Even the air has bits of ash that are still floating in the space. They burned-- through the purpose of that battle while you guys were dealing with all of that, this guy was in here torching everything. You're lucky to have gotten that bit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Man, you did a really good job with what you were told to do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Thanks. I take pride in my work." He's still touching the wound in the back of his head, unsettled.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Little ridge that he's not used to.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Caduceus, are you down here?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh no, I'm not. Just me enjoying a head wound.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, okay, I'm going to go upstairs.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. Is he tied up? Are you tied up?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's not tied up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No. I can-- come on."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you have any weapons left on you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You look over, and he had a sword. The thing he was swinging and attacking you guys with in the doorway earlier.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Does he have it now, or has he chucked it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it tumbled down the stairs when to took an axe to the head.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I will take that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you're taking it he's like, "Sorry about that."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Profession."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's water under the bridge. We just don't want any new problems, yeah? And there's a lot of us here; so it would be foolish to do anything, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You have now officially been conscribed to The Mighty Nein--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Temporarily.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: --for the purposes of this sea voyage, at the end of which, you will be compensated for your duties. If you kill any of us, you will be thrown overboard.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If you jump overboard, we'll jump after you, and we'll bring you back.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Also, as a result of us not mostly knowing how to sail, you are also the first mate.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Okay."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Congratulations.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's a big promotion for him. Carpenter to first mate!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's kind of the worst.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Congratulations!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Okay."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Welcome to The Mighty Nein.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You just got a come-up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Thank you. Should I go get my stuff, then?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're the first mate! Why don't you give us an order?!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Ah!" He points towards you and, "Um." He's not a very intelligent fellow. "Go... fetch me "some... dried meat."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I don't feel doing that. Maybe you should just go upstairs.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm going to go lay down for a minute."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hmm, okay. I'm just going to tie your hands while you're sleeping, though, okay?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Okay."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You head down to the cabin quarters to one of the small cots that are there, essentially, and tie him down. He's like, "Mmm." He passes out; he's exhausted.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Poor guy!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You got a new pet.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's call him--

lines.name: SAM, MARISHA
lines.text: Professor Thaddeus!

lines.name: TALIESIN, MARISHA
lines.text: The second!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What was his actual name?

lines.name: SAM, LAURA
lines.text: Gallan.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: G-A-L-L-A-N.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Thaddeus Klossowski von Musel.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The second.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. While that's happening, the rest of you on the surface, where are you taking it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Time of day-ish?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Time of night-ish.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it's maybe 2:30, 3:00 in the morning, at this point.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Straight out from shore, full sail. Just trying to put distance between us and the coast.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Got you. Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I know we have time to decide on our route.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. But you just take some distance in case of pursuit? Got you. It's a pretty quick ship. You can see why it was used as a messenger ship. You're used to cargo ships and things that are used for shipping, so it's nice to have one that's designed just for speed.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ooh, sports car! Where is Marius?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's tied to the mast right now.

lines.name: TRAVIS, MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, that's right!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No one is paying attention to him, and he's had a long day. He's like, (snoring).

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Not to put you too at ease, navigating was never really my thing, either. I'm better than most, but I do need to decide on where we're going.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If we want to use Marius, we're going to have to wake his ass up and ask him some questions.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You want me to wake him up?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, wake him up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right, okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Not-- (stammers)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (impact)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Ugh!"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That was gentle, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What was that all about?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Good morning.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's still dark."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Don't think that far into it, man. It was a cool line.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Okay. Was that necessary?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Probably not.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, probably not. Listen, we'll let you go back to your slumber right quick. Where were you headed with this ship? I assume to meet up with Avantika, yeah?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I wasn't headed anywhere. I was going to give back their money and send them off on "their way, and you attacked, and they weren't going to let me stay behind, I guess."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right. But now we've changed your plans, yes? You're with us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Apparently!"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And Avantika needs the sphere, correct?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, I don't have it!"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, but I do. Do you know where she is? I'll reach behind my back and use Minor Image again and show the sphere.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right. "I don't really-- I was just hired to pass on a letter and wait for some sort of an "arrival of that, and then it never came, and then I asked for an extension in case it was just taking its time to get there. And then, never showed up. So I had to return the money, "unfortunately. But you know, I like keeping a reputation as a reliable messenger."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Who were you going to give this to?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I was going to give it to-- what's his name, Captain Jawgrasp. Big fella, you cut "the fuck out of and kicked him off the side of the docks."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How many times have you worked with Jawgrasp or Avantika in the past?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "This is the second time."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And what were you doing for them before?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, before they found me on the side of the docks here at the wharf and they asked me if I "knew the quickest way to get this letter up north to Shadycreek Run."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Shadycreek Run. Where we were. You wouldn't happen to know where Jawgrasp called home, would you? Or where he was heading next?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Not a fucking clue, none of my business. I don't ask questions of those who are, you know, a "full foot and a half taller than me and can probably wipe the floor with me. I just nod, "take my money and do the job. Once again, I have a reputation." (sniffs)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you feel comfortable on a ship?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I feel comfortable all right, you know, when I can fucking move! Sorry, sorry, I'm just "a bit grouchy."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We are kind of limiting him. He's got big poofy sleeves and everything, he's not going to swim anywhere.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well that's his own damn fault he has poofy sleeves.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You could rid him of that, I hear sleeves are...

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fucking bullshit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I paid good money for this shirt. Please don't do anything--"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (ripping) (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You rip them underneath the ropes as he is tied to the mast.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You start tearing them off in chunks. He's like, "No! No!"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hey, welcome to the crew of the-- well, we'll have to rename this thing. And I'll summon the falchion and just swipe through the ropes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Ah!" He starts pulling up the scrap of his sleeves. "Do you have any idea how much I paid for this?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm going to remember this."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, you should.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He combs his hair over.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Here is the thing, this reputation you keep talking about? That you are so deeply concerned about--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He pulls a tooth out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, pal.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Aw. Can I have it? (laughs) Deflect missiles!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That seems unnecessarily adept.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll a d10, see how many-- no.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Why are you so concerned with this reputation of yours? How long have you been running around in the criminal underworld is what I'm saying.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Not criminal, I'm not a criminal. I do business with whoever pays well. I don't ask "questions, so I don't know if I've done any crimes."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I can't tell, I don't know. Is he an innocent middleman that doesn't know what he's shipping or is it just--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, I've met this type. He plays stupid, that way if people start asking questions you've got disbelief.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Exactly! So if I don't know technically who I'm involved with and what the larger scale of my "work is, if anybody starts asking questions, I'm as dumb as the rest of them. It's got me this far."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Still doesn't mean you're not a criminal though.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's for the people to decide."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Would you mind walking over to the side of the ship there, and tell me how far Nicodranas looks right now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He goes over and looks. "Can't see it."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. Can't see it, can you? Stuck with us. So I'm going to need everything that comes out of your mouth to be the truth.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It has been the truth! Why am I lying to you right now, you've destroyed my shirt, you've "made me lose a tooth--"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: My goodness, he is very sensitive about this. I'm just trying to set the tone for the ship.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Look, I'm a very anxious fellow. And when things go ass up-- I'm having a breakdown right now."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do me a favor. Go below decks and try and find us some drink, will you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Whatever you want."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Take a little walk, we'll continue talking when you get back.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Jeez, yeah seriously.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: God, I hate him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Makes his way below deck and passes by these guys.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hi!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Hi."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are they coming up?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, they all come out and join you on the deck.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We found some crucial information.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That guy who I stuck an ax in is actually still alive.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No kidding!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, Caduceus saved his life and he's really nice. He's a pretty nice fellow.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's your first mate now. And--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ax-head is?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, don't worry we took the ax out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, Caleb did technically.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And we have this map that goes to the Swaven Islands? We heard the name earlier.

lines.name: MATT, MARISHA
lines.text: Swavain.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's where we'll find Avantika. Who seems to be some sort of cultist, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, she's very religious and is interested in relics.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean, I assume she's a cultist. Maybe she just is a very nice religious person.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe she just likes to collect things.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah! But he said creepy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He said that they were mysterious and her whole crew had some sort of magic-y stuff.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: About the sphere.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He said that they were supposed to collect this sphere, and if it wasn't available, to go look for others. How many have you swallowed?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: One.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Imagine if you swallow another one, how powerful would you become?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Then you'll have two balls.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, does the ball make you powerful? Is there something going on?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I certainly feel like I have gained abilities, yeah. I don't know though. Is this where they were headed?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is where they were going to head after they got the ball, yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: This is a map to a reef. I know the reefs of the Lucidian Ocean, this is very familiar.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Those are the arrows, are the ping-pong points that you have to hit and then you get to the island that you--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, well otherwise you wreck the ship.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You recognise those specific points there?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, there's the Everplume Reef, there's the Torrid Reef, but this looks like the Inkclaw Reef?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a-- this would be a survival check, since this is-- no. For you, make that a history check with advantage. Since it does fall into your sailor background.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (groans) That was less. 11.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It could be one of three reefs.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The three you just named?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There are a lot. There're quite a few.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. It's a toss up, you're not entirely sure which one it is. Give me a second. I can probably narrow it down for you. Give me a second.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There are a few reefs that protect certain islands. One of which is the Darktow Isle.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He said that, Darktow Port.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You don't want to go there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He said it was bad.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But he also said it was far away from the one that Avantika was at.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He didn't make it sound like that's the one that--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He said it was far away from the one where--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That would narrow it to two in my mind. If it's in the Lucidian Ocean. One is far northwest of the Darktow and one is more straight east by several hundred miles.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We came here for the two of you. What are you after?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What am I after? Well I'd like to see-- I keep saying Avan-teek-a, but it's--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Avantika. Who knows, really? It could be Avan-teek-a.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I want to know what she wants the sphere for. I want to know why Vandren had it in the first place. What else are they looking for? Does it have a brother, sister sphere? I don't know.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Why would we not want to go to this place?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, I do! This doesn't look like Darktow to me. Darktow is more in a U shape. You really have to go around the whole damn thing to get in without touching the reef. It's a pain in the ass.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It could be either Inkclaw or it could be Deep Row. Those are the two that come to mind.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Isn't that a little scary?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, that sounds great to me.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean it sounds like she wants this thing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But she might just chop you open and take it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You wouldn't let her do that, would you?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We'll try not to. I really should sleep if we're going to do that, though.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We have plenty of time, it's quite a distance away. So it could either be the Deep Row Reef or it could be the Inkclaw Reef.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We should really figure it out. I wonder if in the morning we can ask Gallan about it, maybe he knows one of those sound familiar.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh yes, yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fair enough. We'll have plenty of time, I could-- well, we have to pick one. One's to the northwest and one's down to the southeast from where we are now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do we have to pick right now or can we-- oh wow, those are two different directions (laughs).

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, let me go downstairs and wake him up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If you want-- we do have the stars on our side so we'll be able to navigate easier. We could drop sail and--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, north is that way, and I point north.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, you're going to be so helpful in this! You're the ship's navigator. I dub thee The Mist navigator.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's the Mistake now. We renamed the ship.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The what? The Mistake?

lines.name: SAM, LAURA
lines.text: The Mistake.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Or the SS Mistake?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, are you saying the Mis-Steak like a good filet mignon or like a mistake?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Or you could put Zemnian and Common together and make it the Shit-ake, if it's the Mistake.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: M-Y-S-T-A-K-E? We're all about spelling things wrong, so maybe we should do that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do I remember if the Deep Row or the Inkclaw, one is closer than the other?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you haven't been all over the coast, these are all just from the trade routes you've done, and the things that aren't directly near or you'll pass on the trade routes-- some things aren't even charted.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: My knowledge is limited to what I've journeyed through before. The Inkclaw is closer, we could try there-- at least set course for that direction. How does that sound?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're the captain!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Would we get there in two weeks? Because that's how much food we have.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh that's a good point.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, travel-wise this would be-- say we put this at the speed of a longship, so per day you could probably do about 72 miles in a longship. It looks like travel to-- to which reef? To Inkclaw? It's about 230 or so, 250 miles from Nicodranas.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, we could do it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Does someone need to man the ship at night when most of us are sleeping?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes, if nothing else to look out for other ships.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And sea monsters.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can we do that without any sailing experience?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's the thing. As you consider, and you know, it takes a number of people to maintain a ship. To go at the speed you would need to, you'd need to have somebody who's manning the sails, somebody who's navigating the ship, somebody who's actually necessary for maintaining the course--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll tell you what we could do. There's a joint stop on the trade routes, an island called Brokenbank, we could make it there. I'm familiar with how we would get there and we could try and find some extra hands.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How far off?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Almost one-and-a-half times the distance I think, --ish.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, farther?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. I've never sailed directly to the Inkclaw Reef. I just know where it is because I've seen maps.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The other thing we could do is find a place on the Menagerie Coast a good ways away from where we departed and some of us could try to find a crew. Also, we left the cart behind.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And my mom and our puppy.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, we could return to somewhere else along the-- Nicodranas or Port Damali.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Maybe we should talk about the whole Nicodranas thing really fast?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys are having this moment of conversation, you can't help but notice in the middle of this talk, quiet off to the side-- Yasha's just on the outskirts of you, holding onto the rope of the sail. She hasn't tied it down yet, she's just using herself to hold and maneuver the sail because that's all she knows. But there is, on the far end on the port bow of the ship, is still Caduceus, legs curled up to the chest looking out over the ocean.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We should definitely talk about it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I didn't mean for that to go the way it did.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't think any of us did. Can we return back to your hometown ever again after that?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That is a really good question.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I feel like we might need to drop some--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Stealing comes with a pretty hefty fine. So does killing people.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, it's not looking good for us right now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Also we have a couple of members of the Mighty Nein that seem a little bit disparate.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I walk over to Caduceus.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll join.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Um, hello?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hey.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I sit down cross-legged in front of him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I maneuver to the other side but sit leaning up against the ship, out of it, but here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (whispers) Saved by the Bell style.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How are you?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think it's been a day.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It has.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Miss Jester, do you have a plan?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hmm.. Wow, no. I don't think I ever have had a plan.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I did. I do-- I did-- I don't know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What is your plan?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (sighs) I... had a mission, a holy purpose, a thing that defined me, and I thought that I was honoring it, and now-- what if I was wrong? This is not what I thought it was going to be.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What was your mission?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's been so quiet, and--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Like how? Do you sometimes hear things?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I always hear things. What if I made a mistake?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I wander over.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well. A lot of times I think that maybe the Traveler has left me and I think maybe things are going poorly and he doesn't like me anymore, but sometimes he'll just show up after a while and tell me that I was on the right path all along, and he just made it fun for me to find it again.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And one day will be the last time; what then?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're not afraid of death, are you?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laugh) That was a lot and the ocean is a lot and this is a lot.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Breathe.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (deep breathing)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The world is a lot bigger than your cemetery. There are a lot of things for you to see, and you have to break out of your comfort zone in order to find the path that you are looking for.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Breathing's hard. (breathing)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just keep doing that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (deep breathing) It smells really weird in here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You can't smell dead people when you're on the ocean.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's very salty.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are you hungry?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm really hungry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you want to make some food? We have a lot downstairs: two weeks' worth.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I like cooking. I think I need to cook.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's go.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's go cook. Really, I feel better, that was actually really nice. I'm going to go cook.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: As they walk away and since Caleb wandered up-- Do you truly believe the amount of justification you were just doing for our actions?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What do you mean, that they started it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Everything we just did. Definitely had a long string of-- sounded like convincing yourself and maybe the rest of us and I just wondered how much you actually believed it, or how much you're trying to convince yourself that you didn't fuck up real bad.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, I'm good.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, that's great.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We kept ourselves alive, we kept our friends alive. I did not expect us to be departing Jester's hometown quite so quickly, but here we are. We're all alive, we're helping another one of our friends. This is not our home.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's not our home, but does that give us the right to shit on everyone else's?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I would not say that we have shit on everyone else's.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right. Okay. I don't know. I'm not looking for answers--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Which part specifically troubles you most? Is it the fact that the town might be without power for a little bit?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Eh, people can adapt.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They can adapt. They have to adapt. People have to adapt. And that creature down there, he's doing better. You can't have a society built on slavery.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's just that-- I've done a lot of shitty things and I've made a lot of shitty choices and a lot of mistakes, and after Molly, I told myself that I was going to try and not do that as much, but it's fucking hard.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Alfield is better because of you-- you have done a lot of good.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can we justify murdering six people to have Jester's mom be a little bit better off?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, they attacked us.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, yep. They attacked us. And I walk away.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll call out to Beau as she's walking off.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How's it looking down there? Spirits high? (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Uh...

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay, no-- I thought I'd ask. How are you feeling?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Conflicted, I guess.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I don't feel very good.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't know. Look, I know we reacted accordingly and in self-defense, but we probably could have a been a little bit smarter about that entire situation.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's been a day, right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's been a fucking day!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We were going to talk to Algar, we ended up killing his bodyguards and setting that thing free, and then we were going to go and talk to Marius and then we ended up killing the whole fucking crew and captain, minus one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: In a part of myself, I'm a little mad because-- I don't know. Everything that tortle was telling us about Marius and how he hangs out at the docks and waits until midnight and I'm like, (scoffs) "What a random, fun guy, just hanging out by the docks at mid--" I don't know, everything about that should have connected in my brain that--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Now, all of a sudden, I have this power and I feel like it's a shortcut and that I've been cheating myself. I don't feel like I've put forth the same effort to resolve something because I can just will something into happening. That doesn't seem right to me.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: In a fucked up way, I can actually relate to that quite a lot. For me, I've always had my fists, and, man, is it way easier to solve problems when you're beating the shit out of somebody.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How does Caleb feel about all this?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Like we were justified in our actions.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, really?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How's Caduceus?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Jester had a good talk with him; I think he'll actually be okay. We might need to do a little bit more maintenance. I feel bad; I've treated people like shit my whole life. And having one transformative moment doesn't mean that you're immediately going to be a different person overnight and being better is something you have to work at, I guess.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That was actually very profound.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can understand taking the easy way out with the power that you have. It's what I've done my whole life. I just don't know anything else, though.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Otherwise, I feel like Caduceus is not going to be the last person that thinks about--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Walks away from us.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I've driven most people in my life away from me. Hearing him talk like that, it's not the first time I've heard those things, and I don't want to drive you guys away. I don't want us to drive each other away. (sighs) Anyway.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We need to decide on a destination, whether we turn around and-- Were we in the Open Quay or were we in the Wayfarer's...?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, that was in the Wharf.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're in the Wharf.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, The Restless Wharf.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The Restless Wharf. We can turn around and come back to the Open Quay or where the Wharfmaster was and try and get in and out real fast with some crew, or we can head to Port Damali, or we can head out to the open sea, but we do need to pick a destination.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is there any damage-- whoever's there! Is there any damage control we want to consider in Nicodranas before we fuck off forever?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Damage control?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, we can't leave without a crew.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We can send a letter.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which, as a note, you would know there are a few different positions that probably need to be filled. There definitely needs to be a captain, there needs to be a navigator, there needs to be a quartermaster-- who is essentially the first mate that is the second in command under the captain and handles all of the elements there. You're going to need some form of a cook, someone that handles and prepares food. You're probably going to need a bosun.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Caduceus. Oh, bosun--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Bosun handles the upkeep on the ropes and the sails and general deck upkeep.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Cruise director, bursar, bartender.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Stand-up comic.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I've seen The Love Boat.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's a bunch of different-- you don't need all of these necessarily--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We don't have any guns? There's not guns or powder--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, this is made for speed. Not that you've noticed, at least.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This has turned into a resource management game.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I live for that shit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Lemonade Tycoon!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do see Yasha, who's still holding the rope but staring off to the south.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This works out for you, you were going to get a boat.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's fine, I guess."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Know where you want to go?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She looks back at you and back at the south and says, "Just looking for a storm."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Fjord, should we have a quick ship's meeting?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, crew meeting, everyone!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Shitty, shitty crackers.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've got plans.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do find a couple of barrels of fresh, tropical fruit, which is new for you, Caduceus, especially. Short-term travel elements there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's good for scurvy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How well stocked is this kitchen? Is it stocked at all?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's stocked at the necessary level for a two-week journey.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, I've got the stuff in my set as well so I'm going to just--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh yeah, you have everything on you to create and evoke all sorts of unique flavors.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're doing some shit. This is on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you calling everybody from the crew together? You are in the process of planning it out and you're taking stock of everything you have at your disposal and you hear Fjord up top calling you guys.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You know that spicy fruit you can buy on the side of the road? We're doing spicy fruit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That sounds so lovely!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That sounds so good right now. I'm genuinely fiending for it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should we go up for the meeting and then come back down?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think we can bring the bowls up. It doesn't take that long.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh sweet! We'll bring up and give people food while we have our meeting.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's bowls. Mine, mine, mine.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: These crackers are terrible.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Spicy fruit! It's spicy fruit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's why it's a bad cracker.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We need to decide on a destination. We're going to need more hands that are able to figure out where we are going next.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: To get more hands, we could either go back to the place that we exploded and murdered.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Not those docks. We could go to a separate landing site.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And risk being spotted by the coast guard.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Super disguised.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Who here cannot change their appearance? You? That's it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We can't change the boat's appearance.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yasha is listening out of the corner of her ear and raises her hand and looks back.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. You've got the boat.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Or we could go further to--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Port Damali.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Port Damali, or some other place on the coast that I don't know. Or this other place, this island that's like 300 miles away.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Port Damali's all the way up at the top. We could just stop at the next city up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What's the next city up?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Next city up would be Port Zoon.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Port Zoon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's about a three-day travel to get there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That is a lot of time, though, to get there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We would be exhausted.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We could turn around and try to go to the-- Where was the wharfmaster? The dwarf. Ingus?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I think it was Ignus.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ignus.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are we seriously considering bringing the ship right back to Nicodranas?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's a different section of the city.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do we have a lifeboat or any sort of buoy or anything?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes, lifeboat. Is there a--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's not a lifeboat, per se. There is a small row skiff.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What about pulling into a cove outside of the city a couple of miles and walking in?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Or we could just leave the boat out in the ocean a little bit and take the skiff in.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are we hiring a crew? Are we kidnapping a crew?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hiring a crew.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do we have enough money?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fuck. I don't know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've not hired a crew before. You just know what you've worked for which is not a lot.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How much did you make when you were--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Not a ton.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's maybe, depending on the job, two, three gold a day.

lines.name: MARISHA, SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We have enough gold.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Our quickest bet is just to turn back into-- What area was the wharfmaster Ignus in?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ignus was in the Restless Wharf.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It was the Restless Wharf.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I guess I could maybe-- can I try to cast Mending on the sail and see if it looks like the burn damage goes away?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. I'll say you can slowly, over time focus-- It'll take you about a good hour or so, but you could eventually get the sail to be unsinged.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe I can paint something on the sail so it looks like a different boat.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ooh yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We can either pull the name off of the boat or alter it.

lines.name: MARISHA, LIAM
lines.text: The Mistake.

lines.name: MARISHA
